text: God kamagh sua, a nguazir kamɨn itir fofozir gumazibar amutɨ, me bar aghumsɨgham. Kamaghɨn, a gari, gumazir nguazimɨn itir gumazibar damazimɨn nɨghnɨzir onganiba itiba, gumazir kabara God me amɨsefe. God ghaze, a gavgaviba itir gumazibar amutɨ, me aghumsɨgham. Kamaghɨn, gumazir nguazir kamɨn itir gumazibar damazimɨn gavgaviba puvatɨziba, merara God me amɨsefe.
